articles.author: Alesia Stanford
articles.title: Amber Heard returns to the big screen for the first time since the Johnny Depp defamation trial - Daily Mail
articles.description:
Amber Heard is headed back to the big screen. 
The 37-year-old actress,  ,  will appear in the upcoming thriller, In The Fire, at the 69th Taormina Film Festival in Italy.
